creator: georg.hackenberg.ext@siemens.com
text:
it is not possible to add users to any group.
the system will return an IllegalArgumentException: invalid group name
the problem is that the group name is enclosed within apostrophes, but it should
not.
the names of the corresponding input elements in the html interface also contain
the apostrophes (edit user screen).
when removing the apostrophes the action works fine.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40720 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
